Article Title: ‚ÄúI feel terrible‚Äù ‚Äî Steve Kerr makes his feelings known about Jimmy Butler after pelvis contusion injury
Article Text:
Steve Kerr and Jimmy Butler. Image via: David Gonzales | Robert Edwards | Troy Taormina-Imagn Images

Steve Kerr comments on Jimmy Butler's pelvis contusion injury



Steve Kerr gives update on Jimmy Butler after scary fall onto back vs Rockets

Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr responded to forward Jimmy Butler ‚Äôs recent injury. Butler suffered a pelvis contusion and exited early in Wednesday night‚Äôs 109-94 loss to the Houston Rockets after a hard fall late in the first quarter. The injury occurred when Amen Thompson was shoved into Butler‚Äôs legs during a rebound attempt, causing both players to hit the floor. Butler stayed down for several moments before getting up to shoot free throws, making one of two. He left the game shortly after and did not return. An MRI is scheduled for Thursday to assess the damage.After a devastating loss to the Houston Rockets, Steve Kerr shared his thoughts on Jimmy Butler‚Äôs pelvis contusion injury during the game. ‚Äú I feel terrible for Jimmy. Hopefully he's okay. We'll see,‚Äù Kerr said. ‚ÄúHe's going to get an MRI tomorrow. And BP really proud of him for making the effort. You know, he's been feeling terrible all day,‚Äù he continued with an update on his MRI.Kerr admitted that there was nothing wrong with the play that left Butler injured. ‚ÄúI think Thompson just, you know, inadvertently found himself underneath Jimmy just based on the, you know, the tug of war that was going on there. So I mean we didn't we didn't think there was anything wrong with the play. It's just one of those plays,‚Äù he said, declaring that it was a clean play from both players.Without Butler, the Warriors faced a massive void as the Rockets came in with all the firepower they had. ‚ÄúYou know they're going to be really aggressive. They're going to blitz them,‚Äù Kerr acknowledged. Still, he is determined to counter that in the next game. ‚ÄúSo. Obviously. We've got to be able to counter that. You know, we had too many turnovers. And against that pressure. So they were blitzing him. And they got the ball out of his hands a little bit. And we just we weren't able to counter and generate enough good offense to win the game.‚ÄùAfter Butler‚Äôs departure, Jonathan Kuminga stepped in and Kerr is quite confident in him. ‚ÄúJonathan was ready. He's been great. You know, he's been preparing every single day keeping a great attitude. You know game one he was on the bench cheering the entire time. He's a great young guy.‚ÄùKuminga missed several games before filling the void in the roster in the absence of Butler. He scored 11 points. Jonathan Kuminga admitted it‚Äôs been challenging sitting out the last three games, but he‚Äôs maintaining a focused mindset. ‚ÄúNo matter what circumstances I‚Äôm in, always got to stay ready,‚Äù Kuminga said. Despite the recent setbacks, he remains optimistic about the future: ‚ÄúWhenever your moment happens, it‚Äôs going to happen.‚ÄùAlso Read: Golden State Warriors hit with unfortunate Jimmy Butler update during clash with Houston Rockets As for Butler, the MRI would reveal the extent of his injury and his future in the playoffs.
Article Summary: Jimmy butler suffered a pelvis contusion and exited early in wednesday night‚Äôs 109-94 loss to the houston rockets after a hard fall late in the first quarter. Kerr admitted that there was nothing wrong with the play that left butler injured. Jonathan kuminga stepped in and kerr is quite confident in him.

Article Title: Michael Strahan stands by FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer through a heartbreaking time days after announcing his new venture
Article Text:
Michael Strahan is partnering with Michael Vick.(Image via Michael Le Brecht II/ABC via Getty)

Michael Strahan proves he is there for his FOX Sports‚Äô colleague as he goes through a tough time



Is Michael Strahan taking on a new responsibility?



Michael Strahan, the NFL legend and the host of Good Morning America, has taken on a new career along with hosting. Recently, the NFL legend announced his new venture but amidst all the excitement, Michael Strahan paid a tribute to FOX Sports ‚Äô NFL Insider, Jay Glazer‚Äôs heartfelt tribute to his father. FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer recently took to his social media to post about his father in a heartbreaking post but it was Michael Strahan‚Äôs comment that showed how much he cares about his colleagues.FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer posted a heartbreaking picture of a black coffin that carried his father, a few hours ago. The caption for the post read as, ‚ÄúTake care dad. Beautiful day, beautiful turnout, I‚Äôm sure he loved it!! RIP Ed Glazer. Love ya big guy.‚ÄùThe NFL legend, Michael Strahan dropped a heartwarming comment that read as, ‚Äú‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚Äù, as a way to show support to his colleague.A few days ago FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer announced his father‚Äôs demise with a happy picture of his father and a heartbreaking caption.The caption read as, ‚ÄúDuring our visit, he said knew he was heading to the other side, I asked if he good with it. He was‚Ä¶We had a really good goodbye. I get to remember THAT, which is a gift. Pretty surreal conversation. But I was able to leave him with gratitude.‚ÄùA few days ago, Michael Strahan announced his new venture for which he is teaming up with former NFL player, Michael Vick , to create a documentary on Vick‚Äôs new life at Norfolk State University where he would be joining as a head coach for their football team.Michael Strahan‚Äôs SMAC Entertainment will be partnering with BET Media Group for this documentary.Michael Strahan spoke about his new venture and said, ‚ÄúI know first-hand the power that HBCUS have on a community and the opportunity they give to so many student-athletes.‚ÄùHe added, ‚ÄúMichael Vick‚Äôs commitment to impacting these young men‚Äôs lives and passing along the gifts that football provided to him is so inspiring. I‚Äôm excited for fans to join on his journey with Norfolk State University.‚ÄùAt the moment, Michael Strahan is spending all his time with his children after his daughter, Isabella Strahan recently recovered from brain cancer.Michael Strahan has also appeared with Isabella Strahan in many interviews as he teared up while recollecting the mental toll his daughter‚Äôs illness had on him.Despite being divorced from his ex wife, Michael Strahan and her came together to be with their daughter as she fought a tough battle against cancer. Isabella Strahan has now fully recovered from cancer and has gone back to college at the University of Southern California.Also Read: Lil Wayne shocks fans with new NFL announcement days after slamming the league over Super Bowl halftime snub
Article Summary: Michael strahan is partnering with michael vick. The nfl legend and the host of good morning america, has taken on a new career along with hosting. Recently, the nfl legend announced his new venture but amidst all the excitement, michael strahan paid a tribute to fox sports‚Äô nfl insider, jay glazer.

Article Title: Is Cody Rhodes' career over? Future of the American Nightmare explored
Article Text:
Image via WWE

Is Cody Rhodes not coming back to WWE?

Is WWE hinting at Cody Rhodes‚Äô Comeback?



Cody Rhodes‚Äô reign as Undisputed WWE Champion came to a controversial end at WrestleMania 41. Facing a heel turned John Cena, Rhodes lost not just his title but also momentum in a match that saw outside interference from rapper Travis Scott. Cena, who aligned himself with The Rock en route to the event, capitalized on the chaos to win his 17th world title - overtaking Ric Flair's iconic record.For Rhodes, it was a heartbreaking loss that reversed his year-long journey as champion, which had begun with his triumphant win over Roman Reigns at WrestleMania 40.In the aftermath, WWE Hall of Famer Bubba Ray Dudley offered a surprising take: Cody shouldn‚Äôt return to WWE television right away. Speaking on Busted Open podcast , Dudley stressed the value of emotional build-up, suggesting that letting fans ‚Äúmiss‚Äù Cody for a while could make his comeback more impactful."I would like to see them wait a while... Where's Cody Rhodes? We haven't heard from him?" said Dudley. The comment quickly sparked debate online, with some agreeing that a brief hiatus might build anticipation.Cody‚Äôs notable absence on the Raw episode following WrestleMania only added to the intrigue. Instead, John Cena opened the show and was later ambushed by Randy Orton - shifting attention away from Rhodes. WWE has made no official statement about Cody‚Äôs status, further fueling questions about whether this silence is part of a storyline or something more.Some fans worry this could hint at a longer break or potential injury, though there is no confirmation of either.There may be hope for fans eager to see Cody back soon. WWE‚Äôs promotional poster for Money in the Bank 2025 in California features The American Nightmare, suggesting a potential return at the July event. The timing would align with WWE‚Äôs strategy of creating dramatic returns around major pay-per-views.A return at Money in the Bank could set up a redemption arc for Cody, possibly even another title shot against Cena before the legend‚Äôs final match in December.Is Cody Rhodes‚Äô career over? Not even close. If anything, this setback appears to be a calculated pause in a larger narrative arc. With time, fan anticipation, and the right moment, Rhodes could be poised for one of WWE‚Äôs most memorable comebacks.
Article Summary: Cody rhodes‚Äô reign as undisputed wwe champion came to a controversial end at wrestlemania 41. Wwe hall of famer bubba ray dudley offered a surprising take: cody shouldn‚Äôt return to wwe television right away. The comment quickly sparked debate online, with some agreeing that a brief hiatus might build anticipation.

Article Title: Rui Hachimura returns after injury in Lakers‚Äô Game 2 win, JJ Redick confirms he‚Äôll keep wearing mask
Article Text:
JJ Redick gives an update on Rui Hachimura (Image via: Getty Images)

JJ Redick on Hachimura: ‚ÄúHe‚Äôll keep wearing the mask‚Äù



Rui Hachimura‚Äôs playoff impact goes far beyond stat sheet





Playoff basketball doesn‚Äôt wait for anyone and neither did Rui Hachimura . On a night when every possession mattered, the Los Angeles Lakers leaned on grit, hustle, and a little bit of masked heroism to grind out a Game 2 win over the Minnesota Timberwolves. After taking a shot to the face early in the game, Hachimura briefly exited the floor, only to return moments later with a black protective mask and a fire in his eyes. The Lakers fed off that energy and evened the series, 1-1, with a performance that was anything but ordinary.After the game, head coach JJ Redick didn‚Äôt dodge the obvious topic, Rui Hachimura‚Äôs unexpected new look. The forward‚Äôs return in a protective mask raised questions about the severity of the injury and what it meant moving forward. Redick reassured reporters that Hachimura is doing well but mentioned that the mask will likely stay on for now as a precautionary measure.It‚Äôs not the most comfortable solution, but it‚Äôs a smart one. Facial injuries can be unpredictable, and for someone like Hachimura who brings physicality on both ends of the floor, it makes sense to take extra care. The important part? He‚Äôs staying in the lineup, and his presence remains a big part of the Lakers' playoff plans.While his stat sheet against Minnesota hasn‚Äôt exactly turned heads, Rui Hachimura‚Äôs presence on the court tells a much bigger story. He brings a level of consistency and versatility that doesn‚Äôt always show up in the box score. During the regular season, he quietly averaged 13.1 points and 5 rebounds per game, while shooting an impressive 41.3% from beyond the arc, proof of his ability to stretch defenses and keep opposing bigs honest. Add to that his size and strength on defense, and you‚Äôve got a two-way player who can slide into multiple roles depending on the matchup.Also Read: Donovan Mitchell‚Äôs injury forces Cavs to think bigger than no. 1 seed And let‚Äôs not overlook his playoff pedigree. Hachimura has built a reputation for stepping up when it matters most. Whether it‚Äôs making timely shots, locking in defensively, or simply providing that calm, steady energy in chaotic moments, he has a knack for shining brightest under pressure. If the Lakers have any plans of making a deep postseason run, they‚Äôre going to need more of that clutch DNA, mask or no mask.
Article Summary: Rui hachimura returned to the court in a protective mask after taking a shot to the face. Head coach jj redick said the mask will likely stay on for now as a precautionary measure. The forward has a reputation for stepping up when it matters most.

Article Title: ‚ÄúPut a big black baby in me‚Äù: Shannon Sharpe posts explicit texts from accuser sparking wild reactions from fans
Article Text:
Shannon Sharpe has been sued for $50 million.(Image via Janssen)

Shannon Sharpe‚Äôs legal team leaks the texts between the NFL legend and Jane Doe sparking wild reactions from fans



Fans troll Shannon Sharpe for being with a woman less than half his age



Shannon Sharpe has been accused of sexually assaulting a young woman but the NFL legend has strongly denied such claims. The young woman who goes by the pseudonym Jane Doe has sued Shannon Sharpe for a whopping $50 million and has also accused him of ‚Äúthreatening‚Äù her. Recently, Shannon Sharpe took to his social media account to release some of the texts between the two and it has sparked wild fan reactions.Some of the texts that have been exchanged between Shannon Sharpe and Jane Doe goes to show the extent of their relationship. As per the 44 pages of texts that Shannon Sharpe‚Äôs team has released, one text reads as, ‚ÄúI know u miss this big juicy a*s ‚Ä¶$25k for each cheek.‚ÄùAnother text reads as, ‚ÄúI wanna be abused daddy‚Äù, while a third text reads as, ‚Äúi want you to put a dog collar around my neck and choke me with it while ur f ‚Äì king me.‚ÄùA fourth text reads as, ‚ÄúYou better crave it coz ur gonna be stuck with it 4 life after you put a big black baby in me.‚ÄùThe texts as leaked by Shannon Sharpe‚Äôs legal team has sparked wild fan reactions. A fan commented, ‚ÄúShe was fetishizing the f**k out of you and you still f**ked with her. Unfortunately you didn‚Äôt have the discernment to see that as a red flag and now you‚Äôre getting sued.‚ÄùAnother fan joked, ‚Äúim 25 and feel like im not supposed to be in this grown folk business.‚ÄùA third fan wrote, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs very weird that yall deal with this disrespect disguised as sexual kinks. Have respect for yourselves as black men. No woman saying anything about yall putting a ‚Äúbig black baby‚Äù in them should be getting yalls attention. Dayum, y'all athletes have terrible taste in women‚Äù, while a fifth fan noted, ‚Äú‚ÄúPut a big black baby in me‚Äù has to be some form of racism‚Ä¶.‚ÄùOthers have slammed the NFL legend. A fan posted, ‚ÄúBro you is way too old to be doing all this, go be with your family yikes‚Äù, while another fan wrote, ‚ÄúMy thing is Shannon often says he‚Äôs single because he can‚Äôt trust the intentions of some women. But then he turns around and lays with the exact women he wants to stay away from. Make it make sense ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ÄùShannon Sharpe and his legal team have denied any claims of sexual assault and attempting to ‚Äúthreaten‚Äù the women, as fans remain divided on this.Also Read: "Fifty Shades of Undisputed": Fans debate whether Shannon Sharpe's leaked phone call was part of a sexual fantasy or a serious threat

Article Title: Kayla Nicole raises eyebrows with flirty message to 49ers star‚ÄîIs she shading Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift?
Article Text:
Kayla Nicole sparks NFL buzz again with surprise birthday comment (Image via Instagram)

Kayla Nicole sparks NFL buzz again with surprise birthday comment

Kayla Nicole maintains a bold presence even after breakup spotlight fades

Kayla Nicole , ex-girlfriend of Travis Kelce , is back in the NFL spotlight after a surprise birthday comment on Kyle Juszczyk ‚Äôs Instagram post stirred curiosity. As Kelce‚Äôs relationship with Taylor Swift grabs headlines, Nicole‚Äôs unexpected interaction has fans speculating about her ties within the league and her continued relevance.Kayla Nicole, the former longtime girlfriend of Kansas City Chiefs star Travis Kelce, has once again found herself at the center of NFL social media chatter. Though she‚Äôs long moved on from her headline-making breakup with Kelce, Nicole‚Äôs recent comment on an unexpected birthday tribute has fans speculating.This time, the buzz surrounds San Francisco 49ers fullback Kyle Juszczyk. His wife, fashion designer Kristin Juszczyk, celebrated his 34th birthday with a heartfelt Instagram post, filled with affection and admiration. ‚ÄúHappy birthday to the love of my life @juicecheck44‚Ä¶ Forever grateful for April 23rd. I love you,‚Äù Kristin wrote alongside a sweet series of couple photos.But what really caught fans off guard was Kayla Nicole‚Äôs unexpected appearance in the comments. ‚ÄúJuuuuuuiiice!!!! Happy birthdaaaayy,‚Äù she posted, filled with enthusiasm and familiarity. It wasn‚Äôt just the message‚Äîit was the tone that sparked curiosity, especially since there‚Äôs been no public connection between Nicole and the Juszczyks before.Nicole, who dated Travis Kelce in an on-and-off relationship for five years until their split in 2022, has managed to remain relevant in both the sports and entertainment spheres. Even as Kelce‚Äôs romance with Taylor Swift continues to dominate headlines, Nicole has built her own following as a fitness influencer, model, and media personality.She‚Äôs also been refreshingly candid about her challenges post-breakup. In interviews and podcast appearances, Nicole has discussed the public pressure she felt during and after her high-profile relationship with Kelce. That context only adds to the intrigue surrounding her latest social media moment.While Nicole‚Äôs comment on the Juszczyks‚Äô post could be interpreted as friendly and harmless, NFL fans are never ones to miss a chance for speculation. With no known history between the parties, the affectionate tone sparked questions about whether there‚Äôs a deeper, private friendship‚Äîor simply mutual respect formed through years of shared NFL circles.Also Read: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce‚Äôs love story in trouble after Kayla Nicole sparks cheating scandal Either way, Kayla Nicole‚Äôs online presence continues to keep her name in the conversation, even as Travis Kelce‚Äôs life becomes more entangled with pop culture royalty. And if this is any indication, the NFL drama off the field may just be heating up again.
Article Summary: Kayla nicole made a surprise comment on kyle juszczyk‚Äôs instagram post. Nicole dated travis kelce in an on-and-off relationship for five years until their split in 2022. Nicole has built her own following as a fitness influencer, model, and media personality.

Article Title: 'Draft Day' ‚Äî Divisive sports movie starring Kevin Costner finds new life on Netflix and fans can‚Äôt stop watching it
Article Text:
Draft Day gets unexpected second chance as NFL fans binge-watch Kevin Costner‚Äôs sports film on Netflix (Credit: IMDb)

Kevin Costner's Draft Day Scores Big on Netflix as NFL Draft Week Heats Up



Draft Day Official Trailer #1 (2014) - Kevin Costner, Jennifer Garner Movie HD

As the 2025 NFL Draft week unfolds, Kevin Costner‚Äôs 2014 sports drama Draft Day has unexpectedly surged back into the spotlight. Now trending on Netflix, the film has rekindled discussions about the intensity of draft-day decisions and the emotional stakes involved in professional football management. With the movie's return to streaming aligning perfectly with one of the NFL‚Äôs biggest annual events, its newfound relevance couldn't have come at a better time.At its core, Draft Day offers a dramatized peek into the whirlwind that surrounds the NFL Draft. Costner plays Sonny Weaver Jr., the fictional general manager of the Cleveland Browns, who finds himself navigating a maze of personal struggles and professional high-stakes gambles. The story unfolds over just 24 hours‚Äîa day that could define his career and change the trajectory of an entire franchise. The compressed timeline might defy the intricate, months-long preparations real NFL teams undertake, but it does an exceptional job of capturing the pressure-cooker environment that GMs endure.Though critics initially gave Draft Day a lukewarm reception‚Äîearning a 60% score on Rotten Tomatoes and a 6.8 on IMDb‚Äîthe film has gradually built a dedicated fan base. While purists and insiders have called out some unrealistic elements, such as Sonny‚Äôs spur-of-the-moment draft decisions, fans have applauded the movie‚Äôs energy, tension, and compelling storytelling. The portrayal may not check every box for accuracy, but it resonates emotionally and delivers an engaging narrative that appeals to both hardcore football lovers and casual viewers.One of the movie's strongest points lies in its authentic flavor, thanks largely to the NFL's active involvement. With scenes shot during the real 2013 NFL Draft and appearances by actual players, coaches, and executives, the film achieves a level of realism that‚Äôs rare in sports dramas. The inclusion of familiar faces not only adds credibility but also makes for a delightful Easter egg hunt for fans. ‚ÄúDraft Day features a ton of cameos from real people in the football world,‚Äù a detail that has not gone unnoticed among viewers rediscovering the film on Netflix.Moreover, the all-star cast elevates the film's appeal. From Jennifer Garner and Denis Leary to Sam Elliott and the late Chadwick Boseman, the performances add gravitas and emotional weight. Each actor delivers with conviction, making the viewer feel the magnitude of every decision Sonny Weaver Jr. faces.In a sign of its growing cultural footprint, Draft Day is also being adapted into a television series‚Äîthis time, set in the NBA. Produced by Lionsgate Television and LeBron James‚Äô SpringHill Company, the upcoming series aims to shift the narrative into the world of basketball, offering viewers another look at the chaos and calculation behind professional drafts.While Draft Day may never fully escape criticism for its narrative liberties, its resurgence proves that it taps into something timeless‚Äîthe passion, strategy, and drama that define professional sports. Its revival on Netflix during NFL Draft week only reinforces its place as a compelling sports drama that continues to stir conversation and capture hearts.Also Read: Shannon Sharpe‚Äôs NFL Draft appearance sparks outrage amid sexual assault lawsuit
Article Summary: Draft day gets unexpected second chance as nfl fans binge-watch kevin costner‚Äôs sports film on netflix. The film has rekindled discussions about the intensity of draft-day decisions and the emotional stakes involved in professional football management. Draft day is also being adapted into a television series set in the nba.

Article Title: 'For the last 78 years ... ': Sunil Gavaskar's emotional outburst on Live TV over Pahalgam terror attack
Article Text:
Sunil Gavaskar (Image credit: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll How do you feel about the statements made by Sunil Gavaskar regarding the ongoing conflict? I don't have an opinion I disagree I partially agree I completely agree with him

Shah Rukh Khan: The superstar who turned IPL into a blockbuster

NEW DELHI: India cricket legend Sunil Gavaskar strongly condemned the masterminds behind the deadly Pahalgam terror attack during a live broadcast ahead of the IPL 2025 clash between Royal Challengers Bengaluru and Rajasthan Royals at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. Known for his candid commentary, Gavaskar appeared visibly upset while speaking on air about the tragic incident."I send my condolences to all the families who have lost their loved and dear ones. It has effected all of us Indians....I just wanna ask a question to all the perpetrators, and all those who backed them (the terrorists), their handlers - What has all this fighting achieved?" Gavaskar said on Star Sports."For the last 78 years, not one millimetre of land has exchanged hands, is it? So for the next 78,000 years, nothing is going change. So why don't we live in peace instead, and make our country strong? So that is my appeal," he added.In the aftermath of the horrific attack, which claimed 26 lives and left several injured, BCCI Secretary Devajit Saikia also issued a powerful statement, condemning the act and expressing solidarity with the victims‚Äô families.‚ÄúThe cricketing community is deeply shocked and anguished by the tragic loss of innocent lives in the gruesome terror attack at Pahalgam yesterday. On behalf of the BCCI, while condemning this ghastly and cowardly act with strongest possible words, I extend our heartfelt condolences to the bereaved families and prayers for the departed souls. In sharing their pain and grief, we stand hand in hand at this hour of tragedy," Saikia said in a statement on Wednesday.The BCCI reiterated its condolences via its official account on X.‚ÄúStanding in solidarity with the victims of the Pahalgam terror attack. Prayers for the families who lost their loved ones in this gruesome attack,‚Äù the post read.
Article Summary: Sunil gavaskar strongly condemned the masterminds behind the deadly pahalgam terror attack during a live broadcast ahead of the ipl 2025 clash between royal challengers bengaluru and rajasthan royals. "i just wanna ask a question to all the perpetrators, and all those who backed them (the terrorists), their handlers - what has all this fighting achieved?"

Article Title: Pakistan captain Mohammad Rizwan loses cool, throws helmet after dismissal - WATCH
Article Text:
Mohammad Rizwan (Image credit: PSL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Who was the standout player in the match between Islamabad United and Multan Sultans? Usman Khan Andries Gous

WATCH:

Shah Rukh Khan: The superstar who turned IPL into a blockbuster

Islamabad United delivered a commanding performance to outclass Multan Sultans by seven wickets in their latest PSL encounter. Chasing 169, United cruised to victory in just 17.1 overs, courtesy of a scintillating unbeaten 80 from wicketkeeper-batter Andries Gous.Put into bat, Multan Sultans managed 168 for 5 in their 20 overs. Skipper Mohammad Rizwan and Usman Khan provided the foundation with a 65-run partnership for the second wicket.Also See: RR vs RCB Rizwan played the anchor‚Äôs role with a 38-ball 36 before falling to Shadab Khan Frustrated with his dismissal, the Sultans‚Äô captain Rizwan couldn‚Äôt hide his emotions‚Äîstorming back to the dugout and hurling his helmet to the ground in anger.Usman Khan was the aggressor in the stand, smashing 61 off 40 deliveries. Brief contributions from Michael Bracewell (9), Iftikhar Ahmed (10), and Chris Jordan (6* off 5) pushed the total to a competitive score. Among the bowlers, Meredith (1/33), Holder (1/25), and Shadab (1/29) chipped in for United.In response, Islamabad got off to a brisk start with Sahibzada Farhan hammering 22 off 13 balls before falling early. Gous then took charge, dispatching the bowlers to all parts of the ground. His 45-ball blitz included 5 fours and 4 sixes. Colin Munro added 45 off 28 to keep the pressure on, while Mohammad Nawaz contributed a handy 21.Multan‚Äôs bowlers couldn‚Äôt find answers to United‚Äôs fluent chase. Gous remained unbeaten as Islamabad finished on 171/3 with 17 balls to spare.The win adds vital momentum to Islamabad United‚Äôs campaign, while Multan Sultans will look to regroup quickly after another missed opportunity.
Article Summary: Islamabad united outclass multan sultans by seven wickets. Chasing 169, united cruised to victory in just 17.1 overs. Wicketkeeper-batter andries gous scored an unbeaten 80. Islamabad finished on 171/3 with 17 balls to spare.

Article Title: Pakistan Super League to stop streaming in India: Here‚Äôs why
Article Text:
Pakistan Super League

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!



Poll Do you support FanCode's decision to suspend the broadcast of PSL matches in India? Unsure, need more information. No, sports should be separate from politics. Yes, it's the right decision.

Shah Rukh Khan: The superstar who turned IPL into a blockbuster

NEW DELHI: In a significant development, Indian streaming platform FanCode has announced it will suspend the broadcast of the Pakistan Super League (PSL) 2025 in India with an immediate effect starting on Thursday, April 24.The decision follows the deadly terror attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, that claimed the lives of more than 25 individuals, including Indian tourists.In view of the deeply disturbing incident in Pahalgam and the ongoing national sentiment, FanCode, the official broadcaster of PSL in India, will not be streaming the remaining matches of the Pakistan-based tournament.The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has yet to issue a response to the development, but the move is already making waves across the sports and political communities, with fans reacting strongly on social media.The PSL, Pakistan‚Äôs premier T20 tournament, has historically had a mixed relationship with Indian audiences due to diplomatic tensions between the two countries.This marks another chapter in the intersection of geopolitics and sport, a space often caught in the crossfire of larger national issues.During the IPL 2025 match between Mumbai Indians (MI) and Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) on Wednesday evening, players from both teams wore black armbands as a tribute to the victims.A minute‚Äôs silence was observed before the start of play, and celebratory elements such as fireworks and music were suspended in respect.Addressing the Pahalgam tragedy, MI captain Hardik Pandya said, "I would like to firstly pass my condolences to the victims of the terrorist attack. We, as a team and a franchise, condemn any such attacks.""We as Australians stand behind Indian people, our strong condolences go out to the family," added SRH skipper Pat Cummins.
Article Summary: Indian streaming platform fancode has announced it will suspend the broadcast of the pakistan super league (psl) 2025 in india with an immediate effect starting on thursday, april 24. Decision follows the deadly terror attack in pahalgam, jammu and kashmir, that claimed the lives of more than 25 individuals, including indian tourists.

Article Title: Dwyane Wade‚Äôs daughter Kaavia spots the mark on his tee as mom Gabrielle Union reveals she peed on him on red carpet
Article Text:
Image credit: Getty Images

Gabrielle Union reveals interesting trivia about her and Dwyane Wade‚Äôs red carpet picture

Former Miami Heat shooting guard Dwyane Wade was peed on by his 8-month-old daughter during his red carpet appearance at the 2019 Kids‚Äô Choice Sports Awards alongside wife and actor Gabrielle Union . The revelation was made by Union in her recent interaction with People, which also featured their daughter Kaavia, now 6, by her side.The mother-daughter duo sat together for the World‚Äôs Most Beautiful shoot for People, during which Kaavia flipped through several throwback pictures of mom Gabrielle Union and dad Dwyane Wade and gave her views on each of them. Kaavia found herself missing in her mommy‚Äôs old pictures, since she wasn‚Äôt born yet, but was elated to find herself in the one from the Kids‚Äô Choice Sports Awards. As Kaavia commented on how her parents dressed up ‚Äúcool‚Äù in the picture and she was in white, Union interrupted to share a trivia: ‚ÄúYou know what happened on this carpet right here? You peed on us.‚ÄùAs Kaavia listened, Union added, ‚ÄúYour diaper did not hold. It did not hold, which is one of the reasons Mommy and Daddy created Proudly, so parents don't get peed on, on red carpets.‚Äù Kaavia then went on to spot the wet mark on Wade‚Äôs white t-shirt in the picture.The wholesome video was shared by Union on Instagram. Actress Viola Davis called them ‚ÄúThe sweetest‚Äù in the comments section. Reacting to it, a fan wrote, ‚ÄúI could watch them all day.‚Äù Another said, ‚ÄúOh my goodness. I love this.‚Äù One more wrote, ‚ÄúCurrently crying, so cute my heart.‚Äù A comment also read: ‚ÄúThis is so precious.‚Äù ‚ÄúKeep shining‚Äù read another.Dwyane Wade retired from professional basketball in 2019. He currently hosts the American adaptation of The Cube. He was named among the NBA‚Äôs greatest players of all time by his inclusion in the NBA 75th Anniversary Team. He was also inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 2023.Also Read: Not Gabrielle Union, one person Dwyane Wade trusted before his cancer surgery will leave you in tears Wade and Union welcomed Kaavia James Wade in 2018 via a surrogate. Union has starred in several TV shows and has the hit film Bring It On to her credit. Union and Wade have also been awarded the President's Award from the NAACP Image Awards for their humanitarian efforts.
Article Summary: Gabrielle union reveals interesting trivia about her and dwyane wade‚Äôs red carpet picture. Wade was peed on by his 8-month-old daughter during his red carpet appearance at the 2019 kids‚Äô choice sports awards. The revelation was made by union in her recent interaction with people.

Article Title: Jeff Skinner: A top NHL talent with unwavering dedication
Article Text:
Jeff Skinner #53 of the Edmonton Oilers attempts to control the puck (Credit: Getty Image)

From draft pick to NHL standout



Jeff Skinner Pots First Goal With Oilers To Give Team Early Lead In Battle Of Alberta

Beyond the rink: Personal passions



Jeff Skinner #53 of the Edmonton Oilers skates with the puck against the San Jose Sharks (Credit: Getty Image)

Commitment to the community of giving something back



Career achievements and steady growth



He was born in 1992 in Markham, Ontario. Jeff grew up in a hockey family, socializing with children around hockey. Before joining full-time hockey, he was a competitive figure skater and had even won a national bronze medal. Early exposure to sports honed his edge and shaped an equally unique style of play. Skinner had already started making news for his natural scoring ability by the time he came to join the Kitchener Rangers in the OHL.In 2010, he was the seventh overall pick in the NHL entry draft by the Carolina Hurricanes . His rookie campaign caused a stir just about immediately. He became the youngest player to ever play in an NHL All-Star Game and then won the Calder Memorial Trophy at the end of the year. His role grew further with time. He also matured into one of the most consistent left-wingers in the NHL. In the meantime, he moved to the Buffalo Sabres in 2018, still setting examples.Off the ice, Skinner keeps a relatively low profile. He previously dated Canadian actress Cristine Prosperi and is known for being a devoted dog owner. While he hasn't settled down with a family yet, his personal life reflects a calm, grounded energy. His love for animals and strong ties with his five siblings point to his supportive and caring nature. The family remains central, with multiple relatives also involved in hockey.While Skinner‚Äôs impact on the ice is clear, his efforts off the ice also speak volumes. He has been involved in several charitable initiatives. These are supporting causes like youth development and health programs. Whether visiting hospitals or taking part in team-led community outreach, Skinner shows up with the same quiet determination. That he brings to games. Though he avoids the spotlight. His presence in community efforts reflects a deep sense of responsibility.Read more: Kings Welcome Back Viral Harmonica Group for Game 2 Skinner's career stats are impressive. He has over 340 goals in nearly 1,000 games. Thereby, he‚Äôs earned his place as a dependable player. He‚Äôs played through highs and lows. But remains focused on performance. Though not flashy with endorsements or social media. He continues to contribute meaningfully to his team and the league.Jeff Skinner ‚Äôs story isn‚Äôt one of overnight fame. But of steady, determined growth. His path reflects hard work, both in sport and life. This also carving out a lasting place in professional hockey.With several seasons still ahead, Skinner remains a valuable veteran presence. He mentors younger teammates while still maintaining his high level of play. As the game evolves, his adaptability keeps him relevant. His lasting influence will likely be felt in Buffalo and beyond, long after he hangs up his skates.
Article Summary: Jeff skinner was the seventh overall pick in the 2010 nhl entry draft by the carolina hurricanes. He became the youngest player to ever play in an nhl all-star game and then won the calder memorial trophy at the end of the year. Skinner's career stats are impressive. He has over 340 goals in nearly 1,000 games.

Article Title: Overwatch 2 Season 16 Release Date: Overwatch 2 Season 16 release timings for all regions explored
Article Text:
Image via Blizzard Entertainment.

Overwatch 2: Season 16 release timings for all regions Season 16: Stadium Official Trailer | Overwatch 2 Region Release Time Eastern United States 2 PM CT on April 22, 2025 Western United States 11 AM PT on April 22, 2025 Central Europe 7 PM CEST on April 22, 2025 Great Britain 6 PM GMT on April 22, 2025 India 11.30 PM IST on April 22, 2025 Japan 3 AM JST on April 23, 2025 New Zealand 6 AM NZST on April 23, 2025 Read More: Overwatch 2 Season 16 is around the corner. Despite being released in 2016 (rebranded in 2023), Overwatch 2 has kept hold of the momentum as one of the most played games of all time. Not just for casual plays, this Blizzard Entertainment game has also been a staple in the competitive gaming arena as well for some years now.When every new hero shooter is dying except Marvel Rivals, this legendary title has been able to carry forward its legacy. And as a result, the 16th season is set to arrive in the game on April 22, 2025. So, when will I be able to play the upcoming season?Season 16 in Overwatch 2 is going to introduce a lot of new features. And the Stadium mode has to be having the most share of excitement around it. Not only that, Blizzard Entertainment has paid heed to the requests of the fans as you will be able to play the 6v6 mode in the upcoming season as well. As it‚Äôs a global launch, release timings will differ across different regions. That‚Äôs why we are here as we will be exploring the launch timings in specific regions. Here are they:Stadium will be a brand new mode in Overwatch 2. Each match in this mode will follow the best-of-seven format, which should last around 40 minutes. However, this mode is only available in Competitive plays. Along with this new mode, loads of new skins are coming as well, like magical girl cosmetics for Widowmaker, Kiriko, Freja, Brigitte, and D.Va. That‚Äôs not the end. The Season 16 Battle Pass has tons of new options for skin lovers, for example: brand new demonic rock band and royalty skins.The Season 16 trailer also hinted us about a potential Gundam collaboration as well. So, the upcoming season is going to be a fun-fest for the fans, Fasten up your seatbelts, because an exciting ride is awaiting in Overwatch 2.
Article Summary: Overwatch 2's 16th season is set to arrive in the game on april 22, 2025. As it‚Äôs a global launch, release timings will differ across different regions. Season 16 in overwatch 2 is going to introduce a lot of new features.

Article Title: Who Is Ndax, and Why has NHL partnered with ‚ÄúCrypto Giant‚Äù during Stanley Cup?
Article Text:
NHL teams up with Ndax for a crypto-powered playoffs (Image via: Getty Images)

Crypto and Hockey: An unlikely pairing?



The trust factor: Is Ndax ready for prime time?



Chasing the Gen Z audience or chasing the hype?



When the NHL announced its first-ever crypto partnership , naming Ndax the Official Crypto Trading Platform Partner during the 2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs , it left fans and critics alike wondering who exactly is Ndax, and why now?The partnership, while groundbreaking, has sparked a whirlwind of debate in the hockey community and beyond. Ndax, one of Canada‚Äôs largest crypto trading platforms, is stepping into the national spotlight at a time when crypto still polarizes public opinion. And the NHL, a legacy sports league rooted in tradition, is taking a bold leap into the volatile world of digital finance .Let‚Äôs be clear that this isn‚Äôt just a logo-on-the-ice kind of deal. The Ndax brand will be front and center during all Canadian broadcasts of the Stanley Cup Playoffs, embedded in camera-visible in-ice placements and the NHL‚Äôs digitally enhanced dasherboards. Beyond the optics, Ndax is launching "Ndax ICE," a campaign offering fans a shot at crypto credits and tickets to the Stanley Cup Final. In short, the NHL is going all-in on this partnership. But should they be?Unlike household names like Coinbase or Kraken, Ndax is relatively unknown to the average sports fan. Founded in Calgary, Ndax (short for National Digital Asset Exchange ) has quietly grown into a regulatory-compliant, high-volume exchange with $17.5 billion in lifetime trading and $1 billion in assets under custody. Yet, critics argue that visibility doesn‚Äôt equal credibility, especially when dealing with an industry still recovering from high-profile collapses like FTX.For the NHL, a league that prides itself on its heritage and integrity, this move feels both ambitious and risky. Crypto, while promising innovation and financial freedom, remains a contentious space filled with regulatory gray areas, price volatility, and consumer skepticism. Is this a forward-thinking leap into the future or a gamble during the most prestigious event in hockey?From the league‚Äôs perspective, the move may be a calculated play to connect with younger, digitally-savvy fans. Crypto aligns with the fast-paced, tech-centric world that Gen Z and Millennials inhabit. But critics warn that this strategy might alienate traditional fans who view crypto as speculative, unstable, or even predatory.The NHL‚Äôs partnership with Ndax could be a game-changing alliance or a cautionary tale in the making. It‚Äôs a bold, polarizing move that positions hockey at the crossroads of tradition and tech disruption. Whether fans embrace it or push back, one thing is certain: the league‚Äôs playoff spotlight just got a lot more controversial.Also Read: Chris Drury‚Äôs new contract- Did Rangers play it smart or stuck in gamble they might regret? As the 2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs get underway, will the NHL make a visionary move by aligning itself with the fast-growing world of crypto, or is it stepping into risky territory at the worst possible time? With Ndax now etched into the ice and beamed onto screens across Canada, fans are left to wonder whether this partnership is a bold step toward the future or the kind of gamble that could leave the league out in the cold.
Article Summary: Nhl teams up with ndax for a crypto-powered playoffs. Is this a forward-thinking leap into the future or a gamble during the most prestigious event in hockey? Critics warn that this strategy might alienate traditional fans who view crypto as speculative, unstable or even predatory.

Article Title: 'A king is one who ...': Vivian Richards makes big comment on Babar Azam
Article Text:
Babar Azam and Vivian Richards (Agency Photos)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Huge prediction! KL Rahul would play in place of Rishabh Pant in 2026 T20 World Cup

NEW DELHI: Legendary West Indian cricketer Sir Vivian Richards has spoken out in strong support of Pakistan's star batter, Babar Azam , amid his recent struggles.In an interview with Cricket Pakistan , Richards reassured fans that Babar will soon regain his best form, despite the tough phase he's currently facing."Babar Azam will soon regain his form. A king is one who rules over all. No matter how good a batter you are, everyone goes through a rough patch. This is not the first time he‚Äôs facing such a phase. Babar is a very good player," Richards said."I am sure he will get back to form very soon. A king is one who rules over all. I believe when you watch players like Kohli and Babar, they appear to do justice to the game of cricket."Babar Azam, who has been struggling in T20 cricket lately, was dropped from Pakistan's T20I squad for the New Zealand tour after poor performances.His form has not improved in the ongoing PSL 2025 , where he has failed to score in his first two matches for Peshawar Zalmi , leaving his team at the bottom of the table.Despite this, Richards, Quetta Gladiators mentor, is confident that Babar will bounce back, just as other great players like Virat Kohli have done in the past.While Babar‚Äôs recent performances have been disappointing, both Richards remains certain that his best is yet to come.He believes in his skill and resilience, and that this rough patch is just a temporary setback.
Article Summary: Babar azam was dropped from pakistan's t20i squad for the new zealand tour. He has failed to score in his first two matches for peshawar zalmi in psl 2025. Sir vivian richards is confident that babar will soon regain his form.

Article Title: Alex Ovechkin Gift To Jayden Daniels: ‚ÄúThe best picture of all time‚Äù: Alex Ovechkin‚Äôs surprise gift to Jayden Daniels just broke the internet
Article Text:
Image source : X

Alex Ovechkin‚Äôs game-changing gift to Jayden Daniels: The NFL star receives signed stick after Capitals‚Äô playoff victory

In a moment that blurred the lines between the worlds of football and hockey, NFL superstar Jayden Daniels , fresh off his Offensive Rookie of the Year win, received a special gift from NHL legend Alex Ovechkin after attending the Capitals‚Äô playoff game. But it‚Äôs not just the stick that has fans talking, this moment highlights a growing bond between athletes from different sports in Washington.The Washington Commanders quarterback, Jayden Daniels, was front and center at the Capitals‚Äô 3-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens in Game 2 of their playoff series. The star signal-caller was accompanied by fellow quarterbacks Marcus Mariota and Sam Hartman , but it was Daniels who stole the spotlight as he took his seat right at the glass-side, drawing the attention of fans and players alike. His presence at the game wasn‚Äôt just about showing support for the Capitals; it was about his star power as one of the NFL‚Äôs brightest young talents.After the game, the players were invited into the Capitals‚Äô locker room, where the NHL‚Äôs all-time goal-scoring king, Alex Ovechkin, was waiting to greet them. Ovechkin, who has become an increasingly vocal supporter of the Washington Commanders, took the opportunity to connect with Daniels and the team in a very personal way. Ovechkin presented Daniels with a signed, game-used stick, a gift that holds extra significance after Ovechkin broke the NHL‚Äôs all-time goals record earlier this month. For Daniels, it‚Äôs a keepsake that marks an unforgettable moment, not just as a fan of hockey, but as a part of a unique sports moment bridging football and hockey.Fans across social media were quick to react to Daniels‚Äô new prized possession. The sight of an NFL player walking away with an NHL legend‚Äôs game-used stick sparked a wave of excitement, with many seeing it as a cool intersection of the football and hockey worlds.The gesture has ignited more interest in how athletes in different sports are building connections within Washington, offering a glimpse into a future where more moments like this can happen.Also read - ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs my hubby!‚Äù Kate Seguin lights up Instagram after Tyler Seguin‚Äôs clutch Game 2 goal As Daniels continues to make waves in the NFL, and Ovechkin pushes for more accolades in the NHL, the bond between these two athletes may signal the start of something bigger in Washington sports culture .
Article Summary: Washington commanders quarterback jayden daniels attended the capitals‚Äô playoff game. Nhl legend alex ovechkin presented daniels with a signed, game-used stick. The gesture highlights a growing bond between athletes from different sports in washington.

Article Title: ‚ÄúEverything is more intensified‚Äù ‚Äì LeBron James' clear approach to NBA Playoff game 3 hints Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô prospect
Article Text:
LeBron James. Image via: AFP

LeBron James details why NBA playoff game 3 will be crucial



NBA Playoffs Are a Different Game | LeBron James & Steve Nash | MIND THE GAME

The Los Angeles Lakers bounced back in the playoff game 2 with a stunning 94-85 win against the Minnesota Timberwolves at the Crypto.com arena. LeBron James , the standout star and Lakers veteran, has recently shared that game 3 in the playoffs is the most crucial for any team. In a candid chat with Steve Nash on the Mind The Game podcast, the duo discussed the shift in the gameplay in the playoffs, even James compared it to the Olympic games.LeBron James recently had a candid chat with former Lakers star Steve Nash on the Mind The Game podcast. While the duo discussed many NBA topics, their thoughts on the playoff game 3 for the Lakers revealed James‚Äô potential move. The Minnesota Timberwolves will be looking forward to adding another win to lead the series, while the Lakers‚Äô stance will also define their playoff run after their game 2 victory.‚ÄúThe physical intensity of the defense ‚Äî you‚Äôve seen them in the regular season, but if they‚Äôre going to blitz you in the playoffs, that is a different blitz,‚Äù Nash initiated the discussion. ‚ÄúThat is a different blitz. That is physical. That is hands. That is the body, feet ‚Äî everything taking away space,‚Äù he added.James hailed the playoff defense intensity while acknowledging the referees for allowing defensive heat a bit more than in the regular season. ‚ÄúThe referees allow it a little bit more, too. The refs allow it. And I love it. And I love when you can be more handsy, you can be more physical, and the whistle is not blown as frequently, right?‚Äù James said in the podcast.Does this mean James and the Lakers are looking to employ his defensive strategy more than their offense? Possibly. And there is a roster of capable players, including Luka Doncic and Austin Reaves, to aid him in clinching another win in the series with a blend of both offense and defense. Still, James, who is now 40 years old, finds it a bit difficult to catch up to the level of the intensity, at least with immediate effect.‚ÄúI actually like this. But I need a game or two to actually get to it. It takes a couple games. Because if you‚Äôve been training your body and playing a certain way for eight months, and then all of a sudden, within one week, you have to now go into the postseason where everything is more physical, everything is faster, everything is more intensified,‚Äù the Lakers legend shared.Certainly, there is a stark contrast in the regular season and the playoffs, as James puts it, ‚Äúlike playing in the NBA to now playing in the Olympics.‚ÄùGame 3 is scheduled for Thursday night (9:30 p.m. ET) in Memphis.Also Read: NBA Playoffs: Golden State Warriors saw crushing game 2 defeat against Houston Rockets after Jimmy Butler‚Äôs injury In game 2, Luka Doncic led the team with an impressive 31 points and also contributed significantly with 12 rebounds and 9 assists in his 42 minutes and 9 seconds on the court. James, playing for 39 minutes and 37 seconds, recorded a solid performance with 21 points, 11 rebounds, and 7 assists.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers bounced back in the playoff game 2 with a stunning 94-85 win against the minnesota timberwolves at the crypto.com arena. Lebron james has recently shared that game 3 in the playoffs is the most crucial for any team. In a candid chat with steve nash on the mind the game podcast, the duo discussed the shift in the gameplay in the postseason.

Article Title: "He has horrible body language": Shedeur Sanders slammed ahead of 2025 NFL Draft as coach says he‚Äôs not good at anything football-related
Article Text:
Just before 2025 NFL Draft, Shedeur Sanders faces harshest criticism yet from an NFL coach (Credit: Getty Images)

Shedeur Sanders faces harsh draft scrutiny amid polarizing NFL projections



As the 2025 NFL Draft is almost here, a rising storm of skepticism surrounds Shedeur Sanders , the quarterback once heralded as a top-three pick. Just days before the event in Green Bay, the narrative around the Colorado standout and son of Deion "Coach Prime" Sanders has taken a dramatic turn, with criticism mounting from all corners of the league.Despite reports that the Pittsburgh Steelers and a few other teams have expressed interest, Shedeur‚Äôs draft process has been anything but smooth. In recent weeks, a wave of brutally honest assessments from NFL insiders has cast a shadow over his immediate future in the league.NFL Network‚Äôs Tom Pelissero shared a particularly jarring collection of quotes that have raised eyebrows across the scouting community. One assistant coach didn‚Äôt hold back, stating: "The worst formal interview I've ever been in in my life. He's so entitled. He takes unnecessary sacks. He never plays on time. He has horrible body language. He blames teammates. ... But the biggest thing is, he's not that good." That statement alone paints a picture of a player whose talent is being overshadowed by concerns about maturity and leadership.Another red flag came from an AFC executive who highlighted Shedeur‚Äôs apparent inflexibility during team interviews: "It didn't go great in our interview. He wants to dictate what he's going to do and what's best for him. He makes you feel small." Such remarks hint at deeper issues that could affect his locker room presence‚Äîan intangible yet vital aspect of a quarterback's role.Adding to the scrutiny, a general manager remarked that Ole Miss quarterback Jaxson Dart had far more impressive game tape. This view was echoed by an NFC GM who recalled liking Sanders a year prior but noted a steep drop-off: "They did change coordinators. It just felt different. It felt less athletic, less arm talent -- everything felt less." That sentiment encapsulates a broader disappointment with Sanders‚Äô 2024 performance.The harshest blow, perhaps, came from an NFC quarterbacks coach quoted by Albert Breer of Sports Illustrated: "This guy‚Äîif his last name was Breer‚Äîand he was coming out of Minnesota, he'd be a sixth-round pick. He doesn't play with good feet, he's late on stuff, he has an average arm. His accuracy is O.K., but he has no timing, no anticipation." The coach also called out his underwhelming pro day performance, noting the absence of rhythm and precision expected at the NFL level.Still, some conflicting reports have cast doubt on just how poorly his interview with the Steelers truly went, suggesting the full story may not be as clear-cut as some believe.Once projected as a top-tier selection, Sanders may now find himself slipping into the later stages of the first round‚Äîpossibly even beyond the 20th pick. Yet, in a draft class loaded with potential but thin on proven quarterbacks, his name may still carry weight. The question is: will it be enough to overshadow the growing doubts?For now, Shedeur Sanders remains one of the most polarizing prospects entering the draft. Whether he becomes a first-round steal or a cautionary tale will be decided not by his last name, but by how he handles the scrutiny and what he delivers on the field.Also Read: Who is Mel Owens? Meet the former NFL player revealed as the leading man of ‚ÄòThe Golden Bachelor‚Äô Season 2
Article Summary: Shedeur sanders once heralded as top-three pick in 2025 nfl draft. Coach: "he's so entitled. He takes unnecessary sacks. He never plays on time. He has horrible body language.... But the biggest thing is, he's not that good."

Article Title: Who is Ashton Jeanty dating? Meet Gabrielle Miller, girlfriend of Heisman Trophy runner-up who was picked by the Raiders
Article Text:
Ashton Jeanty‚Äôs love life in the spotlight as Gabrielle Miller grabs attention (Credit: Instagram)

Who is Ashton Jeanty‚Äôs girlfriend everyone‚Äôs talking about? Here's what we know about Gabrielle Miller



Ashton Jeanty ‚Äôs rise to NFL stardom became official when the Las Vegas Raiders selected him as the No. 6 overall pick in the 2025 NFL Draft. The explosive running back, who finished the previous season with a jaw-dropping 2,497 rushing yards and 29 touchdowns, has become one of football‚Äôs most exciting prospects. But while the headlines are all about Jeanty's dominance on the field and his expected $32 million fully-guaranteed contract, there‚Äôs another story capturing hearts off the field‚Äîhis long-term relationship with Gabrielle Miller The couple‚Äôs journey began at Lone Star High School in Frisco, Texas, where Jeanty and Miller first met as teenagers. Their bond quickly grew beyond school hallways and sporting events. What made their relationship special wasn‚Äôt just shared affection, but a shared passion for competitive athletics.While Jeanty took his talents to Boise State and climbed the ranks of college football, Miller blazed her own trail in track and field. A standout sprinter, she helped Lone Star‚Äôs girls‚Äô team make history by qualifying for the prestigious Texas Relays‚Äîa feat the school had never achieved before. Her speed earned her a place at Austin Peay State University , where she continues to shine on the track. Miller recently clocked a personal best of 25.69 seconds in the 200-meter dash and has been steadily improving in the 400 meters as well.Their relationship has remained rooted in mutual support and understanding. Being student-athletes taught them the value of sacrifice, time management, and discipline‚Äîtraits that have carried into their adult lives. ‚ÄúBouta go crazy on the next level!!‚Äù Miller had exclaimed with joy on social media after Jeanty declared for the 2025 NFL Draft, proving that her excitement over his achievements matches her own ambition.Unlike many NFL stars who prefer privacy when it comes to personal relationships, Jeanty and Miller have been transparent about their romance. From public Valentine‚Äôs Day posts to promise rings and matching outfits, their love story has unfolded openly and authentically. Jeanty once shared, ‚ÄúI love you so much, I‚Äôm so blessed to have you,‚Äù giving fans a glimpse into the strength of their bond.Miller may not be a constant presence on social media, but her dedication to athletics and clean living speaks volumes. According to Jeanty, she maintains a disciplined lifestyle, only indulging in fast food occasionally despite weekend temptations. She continues to train seriously and harbors dreams of representing Team USA in the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics. While aware that time may not be entirely on her side, she remains determined to stay active in the sport, eyeing local meets and even a potential Pan American Games appearance.Her Instagram account, @gx.bby1, may not be packed with daily updates, but it reflects her focused approach to both her sport and her personal life. As Jeanty steps into the professional football world with all eyes on him, it‚Äôs clear that Gabrielle Miller will continue to be a grounding force by his side.Also Read: Who is Travis Hunter Sr.? The proud father who made a courtroom journey to support his son
Article Summary: Ashton jeanty and gabrielle miller are in a long-term relationship. The couple met at lone star high school in frisco, texas. Miller is a standout sprinter at austin peay state university. She hopes to represent team usa in the 2028 los angeles olympics.
